name: webpack-boilerplate
description: webpack-boilerplate is a project that provides webpack v4 boilerplates out-of-box to quickstart development. I decided to create it after writing a couple of medium blog posts https://hackernoon.com/a-tale-of-webpack-4-and-how-to-finally-configure-it-in-the-right-way-4e94c8e7e5c1
